FDO_API void FdoGeometryValue::SetGeometry (  GisByteArray *  value  ) 
 

Sets the geometry as a byte array. The geometry is expected to be encoded in Autodesk Well-Known Binary format.

Parameters:
value Input geometry in AGF format
Returns:
Returns nothing
